methods.name: public static double[] read(String filename) throws SoundException, FileNotFoundException
methods.content:
Extracts audio samples from a WAV or AU file into an array.

This method will throw `SoundException` if there is an error reading the file and `FileNotFoundException` when the file cannot be found in the asset manager.
methods.syntax: This method will return an array of samples as doubles, at 44.1 kilohertz. This means that 441000 samples are played per second.
